ThingDef.label: dryadic claw arm
ThingDef.description: As with the rest of the runic bionics, a limited amount of runewood magic being spread over such a large space means that the arm is less functional than the claw, but this is still a powerful weapon and suitable replacement!

ThingDef.label: dryad claw
ThingDef.description: A set of claws that give you the fighting power of a clawer dryad.

ThingDef.label: dryadic arm
ThingDef.description: The magical properties of runewood are not as potent when stretched across the entireity of an arm, thus a dryadic hand is a better replacement for a missing finger than a full dryadic arm.

ThingDef.label: dryadic leg
ThingDef.description: The magical properties of runewood are not as potent when stretched across the entireity of a leg, thus a dryadic foot is a better replacement for a missing toe than a full dryadic leg.

ThingDef.label: dryadic hand
ThingDef.description: The Dryadic hand has a much stronger connection to not only it's user, but their Gauranlen queen, and so the magical power imbued into it allows for powerful articulation.

ThingDef.label: dryadic foot
ThingDef.description: The Dryadic foot has a much stronger connection to not only it's user, but their Gauranlen queen, and so the magical power imbued into it allows for powerful articulation.

ThingDef.label: dryadic ear
ThingDef.description: Very similar to a runic ear, the dryadic ear has a higher magical concentration and a finer attunement to natural sounds, allowing for a much better spectrum of direct hearing.

ThingDef.label: dryadic jaw
ThingDef.description: A dryadic jaw instills a magical aura into the mouth which assists in eating. Apparently the user's breath reminds people of walking through a pine forest.

ThingDef.label: dryadic eye
ThingDef.description: A dryadic eye is able to filter and process light into the brain as a normal eye, in addition to the faint detection of moving objects and auras of a runic eye.

ThingDef.label: dryadic stimulator
ThingDef.description: A small implant of dryadic magic into the nervous system allows a direct connection to a Guaranlen queen, giving the user heightened abilities in all areas.

ThingDef.label: dryadic brain connector
ThingDef.description: Where the runic stabilizer only stimulated core parts of the brain, the connector allows a Guaranlen queen to fully compensate for missing connections or damaged areas of the user's brain.

ThingDef.label: dryadic lung
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing lung. A semi-symbiotic organic replacement for a lung that utilizes magical and biological processes to filter out carbon in the blood.

ThingDef.label: dryadic stomach
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing stomach. A semi-symbiotic organic replacement for a stomach that is able to break down not only the chemical but the magical properties of food to increase the host's benefit from eating.

ThingDef.label: dryadic liver
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing liver. A semi-symbiotic organic replacement for a liver that uses organic processes to produce enzymes, hormones, and filter as required around the body, as well as imbue those products with magical properties to increase potency.

ThingDef.label: dryadic kidney
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing kidney. A semi-symbiotic organic replacement for a kidney with a powerful ability to scrutinize and filter the body's blood both organically and magically

ThingDef.label: dryadic heart
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing heart. A semi-symbiotic organic replacement for a heart that is mostly driven by magic to pump blood around the body.
